chunk:
Biologique Recherche Serum Collagene Natif

Brand: BIOLOGIQUE RECHERCHE

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: WATER (AQUA), PHENOXYETHANOL, SODIUM CITRATE, SOLUBLE COLLAGEN

Directions: Deposit a few drops of Biologique Recherche Serum Collagen Natif in the hollow of your hand. Penetrate into skin by light massage over face, neck, and decollet

, neck, and decollete morning and evening before moisturizer.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
